original_text:
With their flocks and herds they shall go
    to seek the Lord,
but they will not find him;
    he has withdrawn from them.
korean_text: 그들이 양 떼와 소 떼를 끌고 여호와를 찾으러 갈지라도 만나지 못할 것은 이미 그들에게서 떠나셨음이라

sentences.original_text: With their flocks and herds they shall go
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 양 떼와 소 떼를 이끌고 가리라

sentences.original_text: but they will not find him
